value:
I would have lost myself to despair
a long time ago, had my brothers
and sisters not held me back...

My dark impulses are growing... If this
power hurts any of my friends, I don't
want anything to do with it!

I did not ask for a power like this.
But without it, I could never hope
to shape my future as I might now.

If I hurt Azura again, I don't think
I'll be able to live with myself, much
less face the others...

What do you see when you look
at me? Am I beast, after all?

I can't stay here. Where I go, death
follows close behind... Forgive me
if I leave suddenly.

What enemy would test me like this?
Am I simply a plaything at the mercy
of fate's cruel whims?

The enemy...where are they?
WHERE...ARE THEY? Grraaghhh!

Why does my body not move as
I command it... Do even my flesh
and blood rebel against me now?

Which path will this power lead
me down, I wonder?

I'm Corrin. Let me warn you. Terrible
impulses stir within me, some I may
be unable to keep in check...

What is this power of mine, I wonder?
Lately, I've been asking myself that
more often than I'd like to admit...$k$pTo defend life, to resist oppression...
Is that not a use of power, just like
taking what you want by force?$k$pIs this power of mine for protecting
those dear to me...or for causing
only suffering?$k$pIf there's one person who can help
me to find the right way to wield this
power, it's you, so—$k$pRrghh... Graagh! My blood...boils!
I'm not sure I can hold back much
longer... Please...
たあっ
でやあっ！
くっ
いけない…！
I can't contain it...
Please... Stop me!
Don't try it. Flee!
Uuuaaaaaagh!
It's better this way...
Hrng...
I'm fine... I haven't been sleeping well, that's all...
Rgh... GET AWAY! Oh! I'm sorry... Please...I need to be alone...
That blood coursing through my veins... It grows restless.
I hate this! I am not a beast—I'm a person!
No matter what form I take, I will never harm you. I promise...
Should the time arise when I lose myself completely... Promise me you'll do what you must.
When I'm at your side, it's easier to...stay myself. Thank you...
Hmph...
I should...? What?
Must resist...
